Road of the Forest.description: The Road of the Forest is a major road that runs from Marienburg to Altdorf. It is the main trade route between the two cities.

Road of the Skulls.description: The Road of the Skulls is a major road that runs from Marienburg to Middenheim. It is the main trade route between the two cities.

Road of the Damned.description: The Road of the Damned is a major road that runs from Marienburg to Nuln. It is the main trade route between the two cities.

Road of the Dead.description: The Road of the Dead is a major road that runs from Marienburg to Talabheim. It is the main trade route between the two cities.

Path of the Exile.description: The Path of the Exile is a major road that runs from Marienburg to Wissenland. It is the main trade route between the two cities.
